channel.title: [Runescape 2006] Arsenal-RSPS
channel.description:
[center][b]Rune Arsenal[/b]
[img]http://arsenal-rsps.info/images/Arsenalrune.png[/img]
[b]Links:[/b]
[b]Website:[/b] [url=http://www.arsenal-rsps.info]http://www.arsenal-rsps.info[/url] [b]Play Now:[/b] [url=http://arsenal-rsps.info/chooseclient.html]http://arsenal-rsps.info/chooseclient.html[/url]
[b]Features:[/b]
- Great Economy. You can earn money by doing every single skill. - Every single skill is trainable. Total of twenty-one to choose from. - Custom, but decent Quests. Total of four to choose from. - Great combat system and triangle, which is quite important between danger zone users. - More then twenty custom Treasure Trail tasks. Start them by killing monsters and finding your own clue scrolls. - Very creative home area. A lot of features can be found right there. - Monthly community events and wars between player made clans. - Great and respectful administrators, who doesn't spawn or cheat, but play fairly as other players. - Friendly, nice community and amazing moderators. - Great training places, just like runescape 2006. - 100% Runescape drops, The drops are mid high to keep a economy. - Balanced exp system, You have to work before you recieve a 99 level. - Item reqruitments, some items reqruire a quest before you can wear them.
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jhynsU4gdj4[/youtube]
[img]http://arsenal-rsps.info/images/features/cannon.png[/img] [img]http://arsenal-rsps.info/images/features/quest.png[/img] [img]http://arsenal-rsps.info/images/features/ship.png[/img] [img]http://arsenal-rsps.info/images/features/training.png[/img]
[/center]

item.title: [Runescape 2006] Arsenal-RSPS
item.dc:creator: @Runearsenal Runearsenal
item.description:
@Runearsenal wrote:

[center]Rune Arsenal

Links:

Website: http://www.arsenal-rsps.info
Play Now: http://arsenal-rsps.info/chooseclient.html

Features:

  • Great Economy. You can earn money by doing every single skill.
  • Every single skill is trainable. Total of twenty-one to choose from.
  • Custom, but decent Quests. Total of four to choose from.
  • Great combat system and triangle, which is quite important between danger zone users.
  • More then twenty custom Treasure Trail tasks. Start them by killing monsters and finding your own clue scrolls.
  • Very creative home area. A lot of features can be found right there.
  • Monthly community events and wars between player made clans.
  • Great and respectful administrators, who doesn’t spawn or cheat, but play fairly as other players.
  • Friendly, nice community and amazing moderators.
  • Great training places, just like runescape 2006.
  • 100% Runescape drops, The drops are mid high to keep a economy.
  • Balanced exp system, You have to work before you recieve a 99 level.
  • Item reqruitments, some items reqruire a quest before you can wear them.

[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jhynsU4gdj4[/youtube]




[/center]
